channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Test des Harman Kardon SoundSticks 5 : le design iconique propulsé en Hi-Fi moderne, un son transparent qui réinvente le salon
item.description: La Harman Kardon SoundSticks 5 est un système audio 2.1 de salon iconique, qui mêle design transparent quasi « musée d’art moderne », éclairage d’ambiance et vraie ambition hi-fi, avec 190 W RMS, une architecture 3 voies et une connectique enfin taillée pour le téléviseur. Enceinte de salon polyvalente, à mi-chemin entre kit multimédia et mini-système home cinéma, nous l’avons testée et en voici nos impressions. ...

item.title: Will we get an Apple Ring in 2026? Here's what the rumors say so far
item.description: There's been a lot of speculation about an Apple Ring in recent years – here's what we know so far.

item.title: The biggest tech trends to expect in 2026
item.description: 2026 will be a year of big changes and developments for AI, Apple, Nvidia, robots, AR, and more. Here's what to watch.

item.title: California Might Tax Billionaires. Cue the Inevitable Tech Billionaire Tantrum
item.description: They say they're going to do something that rhymes with "grieve."

item.title: The Best After-Christmas Deals on Gear We've Tested (2025)
item.description: Money gifts burning a hole in your pocket? These deals on WIRED-tested gadgets and gizmos will stretch your dollars.

item.title: Ce moniteur gaming 27″ (180 Hz et 0,2 ms) à moins de 105 € s’adresse aux joueurs fauchés, mais exigeants
item.description: Si vous souhaitez profiter d'une expérience de jeu bien fluide et réactive, mais que votre budget consacré à votre setup gamer est un peu serré, le moniteur Iiyama G-Master G2770HSU-B6 pourrait bien vous convenir. En effet, cet écran PC très efficace est proposé à 102,77 euros par PC Componentes, alors que d'autres e-marchands l'affichent à plus de 140 euros. ...

item.title: Almost 3 years later, it's time to admit that Microsoft Copilot was a mistake
item.description: Copilot wasn't asked for by users, but by shareholders - and quite frankly, it shows.

item.title: The DJI Osmo Action 6 can now record 8K video — a major firmware upgrade is rolling out for free now
item.description: A new update is rolling out now for the DJI Osmo Action 6 that brings with it a host of improvements, including 8K.

item.title: Pixel 10 phones and Switch 2 games round out this week’s best deals
item.description: If you’re taking it easy during the slow, in-between week between Christmas and New Year’s, now’s a good time to catch up on deals you might’ve missed. Many of our favorite discounts from the past week are still hanging around, making this an especially convenient moment to shop. Whether you’re eyeing a new phone, gearing […]

item.title: Your full software kit for ditching Big Tech in 2026
NY Governor Hochul signs bill requiring warning labels on ‘addictive’ social media
item.description: New York Governor Kathy Hochul signed a bill requiring social media platforms to show warning labels to younger users before they’re exposed to features such as autoplay and infinite scrolling.

item.title: New York State will now require warning labels on social media platforms
item.description: New York State will now require warning labels on social media platforms

item.title: ‘Ben 10’ Was, First and Foremost, for Kids—and Also for Itself
item.description: The 20-year-old Cartoon Network franchise never lost sight of the childlike joy that comes with being a superhero.
